title: is that report system works?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Sry but can u guys working a bit more on the report system?  morgana{{champion:25}}  named jfx, not afk, but refuse to play.check the history and u will see only 6% kill contribution. He keep typing im not playing and i wish u guys to lose. 
For god sick it is a rank game and he picked top. Is that not enough for getting banned?

replies.body: Grammar mistakes? And Riot doesn't check your reports.
too angry to fix the grammar... and yea riot doesn't check any way
